mapper.select: select studycafe_idx, studycafe_name, studycafe_lat, studycafe_lng from studycafe

select st.ticket_idx, st.ticket_name, st.ticket_amount, st.ticket_time, tc.ticket_category_name from studycafe_ticket st join ticket_category tc on st.ticket_category_idx = tc.ticket_category_idx where tc.ticket_category_idx = #{ticket_category_idx}
select count(*) from studycafe_reservation sr join studycafe_pay sp on sr.paymentId = sp.paymentId where sr.seat_idx = #{seat_idx} and sp.pay_status = 'PAID' and sr.reservation_endtime > systimestamp
mapper.insert: insert into studycafe_pay (paymentId, orderName, totalAmount, pay_status, user_idx, paidAt) values(#{paymentId}, #{orderName}, #{totalAmount}, 'PENDING', #{user_idx}, systimestamp)
mapper.update: update studycafe_pay set storeId = #{storeId}, orderName = #{orderName}, totalAmount = #{totalAmount}, pay_status = #{pay_status}, pay_method = #{pay_method}, paidAt = #{paidAt}, statusChangedAt= #{statusChangedAt}, paid = #{paid}, pgProvider = #{pgProvider}, vat = #{vat}, supply = #{supply} where paymentId = #{paymentId} and pay_status = 'PENDING'
update seat set seat_status = 'RESERVED' where seat_idx = #{seat_idx} and seat_status = 'AVAILABLE'
mapper.insert: insert into studycafe_reservation (reservation_idx, user_idx, seat_idx, reservation_starttime, reservation_endtime, reservation_status, ticket_idx, paymentId) values (reservation_idx.nextval,#{user_idx}, #{seat_idx}, #{reservation_starttime}, #{reservation_endtime}, 'RESERVED', #{ticket_idx}, #{paymentId})
